about_the_game:
Humanity Remains


"Humanity Remains" is an immersive, third-person sci-fi survival adventure that thrusts players into a treacherous and desolate world. As the last surviving individual in a post-apocalyptic setting, you must navigate through the remnants of a once-thriving society, where danger lurks at every turn.

Drawing inspiration from intense and realistic combat experiences, "Humanity Remains" delivers tactical gameplay and gripping exploration without relying on traditional zombies. Instead, you'll encounter formidable adversaries, both human and mutant, as you unravel the mysteries behind the downfall of civilization.

Explore a vast and atmospheric sandbox environments, featuring intricately designed locations teeming with hidden secrets and captivating lore. From decaying urban landscapes to hazardous wilderness, you'll witness the remnants of humanity's struggle and confront the consequences of a world forever changed.

Immerse yourself in a thought-provoking narrative that presents moral dilemmas and branching lore. Your choices shape the destiny of the shattered world and determine the fate of the few who remain. Will you be a beacon of hope or succumb to the darkness that envelops humanity?

With stunning visuals, immersive audio, and a gripping atmosphere, "Humanity Remains" offers a co-op experience that challenges your survival skills, combat prowess, and intellect. Uncover the secrets that led to the world's collapse, forge your own path, and embark on a thrilling sci-fi adventure that will leave an indelible mark on your gaming journey.
